content:
Yes, some of the Italian restaurants in New Haven offer outdoor seating. Here's a list of some Italian restaurants with outdoor seating options:

1. L'Orcio - offers outdoor patio seating with a beautiful garden view.

2. Consiglio's Restaurant - offers outdoor seating on their sidewalk patio.

3. Tre Scalini - offers outdoor seating on their sidewalk patio.

4. Goodfellas - offers outdoor seating in the front of the restaurant.

5. Basta Trattoria - offers outdoor seating on their sidewalk patio.

Please note that outdoor seating options may vary based on weather and current restrictions. It's always best to call ahead and confirm availability.
